item.title: Create a Bitcoin pruned node
item.description: Which is the main purpose of this? Run a Bitcoin node needs over 1/2 TB of hard disk. It's not so much, but if you have a Raspberry PI or any other small computer, the space is a problem. A pruned node maintains only the last transactions, then you can run a node with only +550MB for the blockchain database. Install it! Steps: Download Bitcoin Core. Setup initial configuration file.
